mapper.select: SELECT t1.ACCOUNT as userId,t2.ROLE_NAME as currentAuthority FROM back_user t1,back_role t2,back_user_role t3 WHERE t1.USER_ID=t3.USER_ID AND t2.ROLE_ID=t3.ROLE_ID AND t1.ACCOUNT=#{account} AND t1.`PASSWORD`=#{password}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM back_user t1,back_menu t2,back_role t3,back_menu_role t4,back_user_role t5 WHERE t1.USER_ID=t5.USER_ID AND t2.MENU_ID=t4.MENU_ID AND t3.ROLE_ID=t5.ROLE_ID AND t3.ROLE_ID=t4.ROLE_ID AND t1.ACCOUNT=#{account} AND t2.MENU_URL=#{url}
SELECT t1.USER_NAME AS `name`,t1.HEAD_IMG AS avatar FROM back_user t1 WHERE t1.ACCOUNT=#{account}
